function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large changes in Rt in response to non-pharmaceutical interventions","Impact":"Uncertainty in the effectiveness of interventions and potential for uncontrolled propagation of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Conducting ongoing evaluation of the effectiveness of interventions and adjusting strategies accordingly","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling and data analysis","People":"Population in countries with advanced epidemics and larger numbers of deaths","Owner":"Public health authorities and researchers"},{"Description":"Differences in reproduction numbers (Rt) across countries","Impact":"Potential for varying rates of disease transmission and control measures between countries","Mitigation":"Collaboration and sharing of best practices between countries to harmonize intervention strategies","Technologies":"International public health communication and collaboration platforms","People":"International public health organizations and government representatives","Owner":"International public health organizations and government representatives"},{"Description":"Inability to conclude whether interventions are sufficient to drive Rt below 1","Impact":"Risk of ongoing transmission and inability to achieve control over contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Continual assessment of intervention effectiveness and implementation of additional measures as needed","Technologies":"Real-time data monitoring and analysis tools","People":"Public health authorities and policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities and policymakers"}]}
